review: LOVE the Fire TV.  I have been mulling over a stream box for longer than a year.  When I would decide there would be news of another one coming out that surpasses.  I purchased a cheap Android box on Amazon and it was good.  Worked for me but not as clean as usual.  The Fire TV is perfect for my family.They used to hate to have to navigate the Android box and all I had to set up.  From weather to sports updates I had everything set up like a large tablet.  If you need a recommendation for something like that, just browse, it's out there.The FireTV OS is perfect for the family.  Easy for them to navigate and lots of apps.  Plus, since I am a Prime subscriber I wanted something that would let me access all that Amazon offers with that.  I love the 2 day shipping but the perks of music and movies/tv makes it well worth it.  This box makes it easy to think that this will stand the test of time.  The specs are well above anything that is the same price range unless you want to go with a no name Android box and hope that you will be happy with the OS.
